title: Leachco Snoogle Mini - Compact Side Sleeper Pregnancy Pillow - Ivory
description: Brand New Leachco Snoogle Mini Compact Side Sleeper Pregnancy Pillow Ivory The Snoogle Mini is uniquely designed to provide support in the areas you need it most during pregnancy while still leaving you plenty of room in the bed. The horseshoe shaped head pillow allows you to attain the position and height that is just right for you.The slightly curved end tucks snugly between the knees as it conforms to your body's shape keeping you cool and comfortable all night long! It even helps you stay in the doctor-recommended side sleeping position. Perfect for sleeping, relaxing and even nursing baby. Complete with removable/washable cover. Item# 13840 New in its original box
